title: Guess The LoFi Video Game Soundtrack - Game Showdown
description:
Over 500 games and apps use AI-powered NVIDIA DLSS! Here's the latest: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/news/dlss-payday-3-riven-tribes-3-kristala

Go to kindafunny.com/store to get our limited time Pride Collection! A portion of the sales will be donated to Queer LifeSpace and Denver based Center on Colfax!

"Ryan Mccaffrey and Imran Kahn step in for Andy and Tim but how far will their video game soundtrack knowledge take them?

Season 2 Ep 8.

Links to the Lo-Fi songs used in the episode

I Don't Want to Set the World on Fire (Fallout Lofi) by Jembei: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bsxkz8tPiYQ
Battle Theme by Rifti Beats: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_PEQhKUDRNU&t=861s
Mii Channel - Mii Plaza (Lofi Lia Remix): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CGMfs0PgTmo
Mario Kart 64 - Sherbet Land (Lofi Lia Remix): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=svEg_ZMiklY
Ancient Lake (Diddy Kong Racing Lofi) by Storchy: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kcfNVYPUq6g
Beneath The Mask by Merkeyz: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aM9dxd2nRwE&t=2229s
Chop Chop master But LoFi [Parappa the rapper LoFi] by Moon30: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FcplvRrhGzY

Time Stamps:
